Microsoft-Academic.title: deliberative democracy in australia the changing place of parliament
terms of trust arguments over ethics in australian government
how democratic is parliament a case study in auditing the performance of parliaments
how power changes hands transition and succession in government

ANDS-Grants.description: What is the public benefit of the endless rituals of rhetorical claim and counter-claim performed by members of parliament? This project demonstrates that rhetoric is central to politics, through detailed case analysis of the performative side of Australian parliamentary politics. Good rhetoric, when we have it, makes for good politics.
ANDS-Grants.title: Discovery Projects - Grant ID: DP130104628
